channel.title: Skillcapes [PI]
channel.description: well i have added skillcape emotes to my PI client\server, before when i used emotes, they would work perfectly but i only had 6 capes in, now that i have them all added, the gfx's just freeze and the emote doesnt work anymore...does anyone have a fix for this? also, the statue in varrock fountain has now been turned into the pie from the cooking emote -.- (r0fltr0l0l) soo..a fix for this too?

item.title: Skillcapes [PI]
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

well i have added skillcape emotes to my PI client\server, before when i used emotes, they would work perfectly but i only had 6 capes in, now that i have them all added, the gfx’s just freeze and the emote doesnt work anymore…does anyone have a fix for this? also, the statue in varrock fountain has now been turned into the pie from the cooking emote -.- (r0fltr0l0l) soo…a fix for this too?
